bulkUrlShortening.title: Bulk URL Shortening

features.title: MiniFyn Features
features.whatWeDoDescription: MiniFyn is a powerful URL shortening service designed for developers and businesses. We transform long, complex URLs into short, memorable links that are easy to share and track.

basicCapabilities.qrCodeGeneration: QR code generation for each shortened link
basicCapabilities.linkAnalytics: Detailed link analytics and click tracking
basicCapabilities.customization: Custom short link aliases for branded links

descriptions.urlShortening: Transform long URLs into concise, shareable links with just a click.
descriptions.qrCodeGeneration: Create QR codes for your shortened links, perfect for print media and contactless sharing.
descriptions.linkAnalytics: Gain insights into your link performance with detailed click tracking and geographic data.
descriptions.customization: Personalize your short links with custom aliases to reinforce your brand.
descriptions.apiAccess: Seamlessly integrate URL shortening into your applications with our robust API.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Simple, transparent pricing to fit your needs

freePlan.title: Link Free
freePlan.description: Perfect for personal use and small projects

proPlan.title: Link Pro
proPlan.description: Ideal for businesses and power users

shortenedUrlWillAppearHere: Your shortened URL will appear here
errorShortening: An error occurred while shortening the URL. Please try again.
urlNotFound: The requested URL was not found.
errorOccurred: An error occurred while processing your request.
redirectCountdown: You will be redirected in {{seconds}} seconds.
anonymousAdMessage: Please wait while we process your request.
clickCount: This link has been clicked {{count}} times.
clickHereIfNotRedirected: Click here if you're not redirected automatically.
shortPlaceholder: Minified URL will be displayed here
